## Depedency management

- [rockdb-5.2.1](https://codeload.github.com/facebook/rocksdb/tar.gz/rocksdb-5.2.1)

- [protoc-2.6.1](https://github.com/google/protobuf/releases/download/v2.6.1/protobuf-2.6.1.tar.gz)

- [libevent-2.1.8-stable](https://github.com/libevent/libevent/releases/download/release-2.1.8-stable/libevent-2.1.8-stable.tar.gz)

- [jemalloc-4.4.0](https://github.com/jemalloc/jemalloc/releases/download/4.4.0/jemalloc-4.4.0.tar.bz2)

- [gtest-c6d1811](https://github.com/logcabin/gtest)
